word:
[Deuteronomy 11:18-21, 26-28; 10:12; Deuteronomy 7:6, 7, 9-11, quoted.] 
     A thousand generations is a long time. Before it ends, the Lord will come in the clouds of heaven, and His faithful people will be in His kingdom, keeping His commandments faithfully.--Ms 88, 1897. 

Ellen G. White Estate Washington, D. C. May 12, 1988. Entire Ms.
